pullrequest.title: Only initialize the marker service in the client (GUI) scene [targeting gazebo8]

content.raw:
Just curious, were the markers showing up on the server scene? (visible to camera sensors) 

I can imagine use-cases for adding markers that are visible to sensors, but I suspect this may not have been tested when markers were added.
